body:
* Adds OpenBLAS version 0.3.1
* Adds a patch for OpenBLAS versions 0.3.1 and 0.3.2 that fixes `find_package(OpenBLAS)` in CMake. See https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/pull/1703 for the patch. The patch has already landed upstream and will be released with OpenBLAS 0.3.3.
title: openblas: add @0.3.1, patch CMake export bug in @0.3.1:0.3.2
